name: The Pale Buddha II
description:
A tribute to Paper Buddha.

The idea was what if Paper Buddha depicts in a less oriental way, but still showing its characteristics, like multiple hands and mandala.

The Pale Buddha is strolling in the park with little Pale Buddhas, they're playing ball while chanting.

Animated Digital Collage
finished on January 17, 2022
